snippet.title: Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers | Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the Titan Chasers - elite explorers, mercenaries and thrill-seekers - and step onto the shores of the Siren Isles, an untamed new ecosystem forged by the Rise of the Titans. Battle for survival and control on the edge of civilisation.


Face epic monsters like the Mother Longlegs, Rock Critters and the deadly Skullcrawlers. Witness the fury of Godzilla and Kong, and join the fight against colossal predators.


The Monsterverse comes to life in Godxilla x Kong: Titan Chasers; a 4X MMO strategy game where you will take your place among legends!

Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers is now available for pre-order on Apple devices and pre-registration for Android will follow soon!

PRE-ORDER: Welcome to the Siren Isles, Chasers.

Soon, you'll be able to touch down on uncharted terrain; a wild land of monsters where the only law is the law of nature...and the Titans.

Pre-order the game now on your iOS devices! Pre-registration for Google Play will be announced soon.

PRE-ORDER: https://apple.co/47VddA2


Leave us a comment below and thanks for watching!

Subscribe to the channel: https://www.youtube.com/@gxktitanchasers/?sub_confirmation=1

@HuntedCowStudios
